snippet: Lobby of the Casino a local landmark built in 1930's on Catalina Island with rich wood panelling and comfortable seating; the 'Casino isn't a gambling establishment but a public building with a movie theatre on the ground floor and ballroom on the top floor, the most recognizable landmark in the City of Avalon. It contains a theater, a ballroom, and a museum.Built by William Wrigley Jr. using Art Deco and Mediterranean Revival,12 stories tall.The upper level houses the world's largest circular ballroom with a 180-foot (55 m) diameter dance floor.The Avalon Theater, on the first level, shows first-run movies nightly. The theatre has one movie screen and a seating capacity of 1154.
title: Luxury Lobby

snippet: MADRID, SPAIN - SEPTEMBER 30:  Cinema seats are empty at Cuatro Caminos Renoir Cinemas hours before it closes for good on September 30, 2013 in Madrid, Spain. The Renoir Cinema will close down due to financial difficulties, since opening its doors in 1986. The financial crisis, the high rate of illegal movie downloads and the VAT increase from 8 to 21 percent a year ago have lead many cinemas to close. In Madrid center 40 cinemas have closed down in the last 10 years.  (Photo by Pablo Blazquez Dominguez/Getty Images)
title: The Renoir Cinema In Madrid Closes After Struggling During The Spanish Recession

snippet: MADRID, SPAIN - SEPTEMBER 30:  Cinema seats are empty at Cuatro Caminos Renoir Cinemas hours before it closes for good on September 30, 2013 in Madrid, Spain. The Renoir Cinema will close down due to financial difficulties, since opening its doors in 1986. The financial crisis, the high rate of illegal movie downloads and the VAT increase from 8 to 21 percent a year ago have lead many cinemas to close. In Madrid center 40 cinemas have closed down in the last 10 years.  (Photo by Pablo Blazquez Dominguez/Getty Images)
title: The Renoir Cinema In Madrid Closes After Struggling During The Spanish Recession

snippet: AURORA, CO - JULY 20:  The Century 16 movie theatre is seen where a gunmen attacked movie goers during an early morning screening of the new Batman movie, 'The Dark Knight Rises' July 20, 2012 in Aurora, Colorado. According to reports, 12 people have been killed and over 59 injured. Police have the suspect, twenty-four year old James Holmes of North Aurora, in custody.  (Photo by Thomas Cooper/Getty Images)
title: Gunman Kills At Least 10 At Screening of The Dark Knight Rises

snippet: LONDON, ENGLAND - FEBRUARY 26: London Mayor Sadiq Khan addresses the crowd as thousands gather to watch a free screening and UK premier of Iranian film The Salesman in Trafalgar Square on February 26, 2017 in London, England. The film's director Asghar Farhadi said that he would boycott the Oscars ceremony, held tonight in Hollywood, in protest of US President Donald Trump's immigration policy. (Photo by Jack Taylor/Getty Images)
title: Iranian Film The Salesman Is Shown In Trafalgar Square On Oscar Night

snippet: AURORA, CO - JULY 20:  The Century 16 movie theatre is seen where a gunmen attacked movie goers during an early morning screening of the new Batman movie, 'The Dark Knight Rises' July 20, 2012 in Aurora, Colorado. According to reports, 12 people have been killed and over 59 injured. Police have the suspect, twenty-four year old James Holmes of North Aurora, in custody.  (Photo by Thomas Cooper/Getty Images)
title: Gunman Kills At Least 10 At Screening of The Dark Knight Rises

snippet: Novice Buddhist monks playing on mobile phone in the monastery in Bhaktapur, Nepal. Bhaktapur is an ancient Newar town in the east corner of the Kathmandu Valley, Nepal. It is the third largest city in Kathmandu valley and was once the capital of Nepal during the great Malla Kingdom until the second half of the 15th century. Bhaktapur is listed as a World Heritage by UNESCO for its rich culture, temples, and wood, metal and stone artwork.
title: Novice Buddhist monks playing on mobile phone, Bhaktapur

snippet: French-American art dealer Fernand Legros (1931 - 1983) with actress Christine Abt on the set of the comedy film 'Comment se faire reformer', (aka 'How To Reform'), directed by Philippe Clair, October 1977. Legros plays a military psychiatrist in the film. For many years, Legros sold works by the painter and prolific art forger Elmyr de Hory. (Photo by Alain Dejean/Sygma via Getty Images)
title: Legros On Film Set

snippet: DYERSVILLE, IA - AUGUST 25: A 'ghost player' recreating the role of Chicago White Sox legend Shoeless Joe Jackson plays ball with a young tourist at the baseball field created for the motion picture 'Field of Dreams' on August 25, 1991 in Dyersville, Iowa. Rita and Al Ameskamp who, with Don and Becky Lansing, co-own the site have turned the cornfields and baseball diamond into a summertime tourist attraction, including 'ghost player' reenactments. (Photo by Jonathan Daniel/Getty Images)
title: Film location for the movie 'Field of Dreams'

snippet:
The theatre was divided into three sectors, caveas summa, media, and ima.

The lowest sector, cavea ima, was set aside for visitors of the highest social status – the nobility, magistrates, and priests.

The other classes sat higher, and got to their seats through separate passageways, much narrower than the entrance for cavea ima.
title: Entrance to cavea summa, at Roman Theatre in Mérida, Spain

snippet: Roman consul Marcus Agripa was the main instigator for bulding it. Construction began at year 16 b.C. Modifications were often made: at 105 a new frons scaenae was elevated and later -year 333- modified. The porticus postscaenae, or back part of the scene, and the rows are the only extant structure from its first design.
title: Roman Theatre of Mérida : One of the statues on the theatre stage (Emerita Augusta), at Merida, Badajoz

snippet: The second of the three aqueducts is called the San Lázaro. It had its sources - called Casa Herrera, Valhondo, and Las Tomas - to the north and northeast of Augusta Emerita and supplied among others the bathhouse near the Civic Forum in the center of the city. This water conduct was almost completely underground, except for the place where it had to cross the Albarregas; the bridge across the depression is still visible today, northwest of the circus.
title: Augusta Emerita, San Lázaro Aqueduct, Merida, Spain

snippet: Roman consul Marcus Agripa was the main instigator for bulding it. Construction began at year 16 b.C. Modifications were often made: at 105 a new frons scaenae was elevated and later -year 333- modified. At its center and lower part, there was an also semicircular orchestra. Its diameter was 30 m. long, with three rows of poedria reservated for Emeritan high society and divided by a small semicircular wall called 'balteus'. This orchestra was covered with marble. At its front vertical of podium was elevated: the frons pulpiti, composed by several right and round exedrae. Beside 13 doors to enter the rows, there were two more for the scene: they wall have vaulted walls.
title: Roman Theatre of Mérida : orchestra detail (Emerita Augusta), at Merida, Badajoz

snippet:
The theatre was divided into three sectors, caveas summa, media, and ima.

The lowest sector, cavea ima, was set aside for visitors of the highest social status – the nobility, magistrates, and priests.

The other classes sat higher, and got to their seats through separate passageways, much narrower than the entrance for cavea ima.
title: Entrance to cavea ima, at Roman Theatre in Mérida, Spain

snippet: Roman consul Marcus Agripa was the main instigator for bulding it. Construction began at year 16 b.C. Modifications were often made: at 105 a new frons scaenae was elevated and later -year 333- modified. Frons scaenae, or front of the scene is the most outstanding element at the whole. On a podium 2,5 m. high, covered with marble, there were two groups of Corinthian columns almost 30 m. high. Bases and capitals are in white marble; columns in blue one. On each order of columns there are entablatures with architrave, frieze and cornice, all decorated. On them, there were Imperial divinized statues of gods and classic heroes: Ceres, Pluto, Jupiter, Proserpine... Between them there are three doors as an access to scene: the central -valva regia- one and the lateral -valva hospitalarium-. Behind this façade, there are several rooms for actors and other persons
title: Roman Theatre of Mérida : stage , columns and sculpture (Emerita Augusta), at Merida, Badajoz

snippet: Roman consul Marcus Agripa was the main instigator for bulding it. Construction began at year 16 b.C. snippet: SIEM REAP, CAMBODIA - FEBRUARY 18:  Angelina Jolie (right) laughs with actress Sareum Srey Moch (left) during a press conference ahead of the premiere of their new movie 'First They Killed My Father' set up at the Raffles Grand Hotel D'Angkor on February 18, 2017 in Siem Reap, Cambodia. Angelina Jolie is in Siem Reap for the world premiere of her new movie, 'First They Killed my Father,' a Netflix-produced adaption of the autobiography by the same name penned by Loung Ung, who lived through the Khmer Rouge regime as a young child. The film will be screened Saturday night in the Angkor Wat temple complex, and released later this year on Netflix. (Photo by Omar Havana/Getty Images)
title: Angelina Jolie Attends 'First They Killed My Father' Premiere In Cambodia
